services.title: Pelayanan Akademik
services.description: Pengelolaan administrasi akademik, KRS, nilai, dan transkrip mahasiswa.
services.content:
Layanan Akademik BAAK berfokus pada kelancaran proses belajar mengajar. Kami membantu mahasiswa dalam:

1. Pengisian dan Perubahan Kartu Rencana Studi (KRS)
2. Pencetakan Kartu Hasil Studi (KHS) dan Transkrip Nilai
3. Pengurusan Surat Keterangan Mahasiswa Aktif
4. Legalisir dokumen akademik

Silakan datang ke loket pelayanan kami atau hubungi via WhatsApp untuk informasi lebih lanjut.
services.descriptionEn: Management of academic records, course registration, grades, and student transcripts.
services.contentEn:
The BAAK Academic Services focus on facilitating the teaching and learning process. We assist students with:

1. Filling out and changing Study Plan Cards (KRS)
2. Printing Study Result Cards (KHS) and Transcripts
3. Processing Active Student Certificates
4. Legalizing academic documents

Please visit our service counter or contact us via WhatsApp for further information.

services.title: Jadwal Kuliah
services.description: Informasi jadwal kuliah semester berjalan untuk seluruh program studi.
services.descriptionEn: Current semester lecture schedule information for all study programs.
services.contentEn: Check the latest class schedule here.

services.title: Kalender Akademik
services.description: Agenda kegiatan akademik universitas selama satu tahun ajaran.
services.descriptionEn: The university's academic calendar for one academic year.

services.title: Pelayanan Kemahasiswaan
services.description: Pendampingan kegiatan kemahasiswaan, beasiswa, dan pengembangan mahasiswa.
services.content:
Bagian Kemahasiswaan mendukung pengembangan soft skills dan kesejahteraan mahasiswa melalui:

  1. Informasi dan seleksi Beasiswa (KIP-K, Prestasi, Yayasan)
  2. Pendampingan Organisasi Mahasiswa (Ormawa) dan UKM
  3. Pengurusan surat tugas dan dispensasi kegiatan
  4. Konseling dan pengembangan karir
services.descriptionEn: Assistance with student activities, scholarships, and student development.
services.contentEn:
The Student Affairs Division supports the development of soft skills and student welfare through:

  1. Scholarship information and selection (KIP-K, Achievement, Foundation)
  2. Assistance for Student Organizations (Ormawa) and UKM
  3. Processing of assignment letters and activity dispensations
  4. Counseling and career development

services.title: Administrasi Akademik
services.description: Pengelolaan data akademik, ijazah, dan sertifikat kelulusan.
services.content:
Layanan Administrasi Akademik menangani dokumen penting kelulusan:

  1. Pendaftaran dan pemberkasan Wisuda
  2. Penerbitan Ijazah dan Transkrip Akhir
  3. Sertifikat Kompetensi dan SKPI
  4. Verifikasi data alumni
services.descriptionEn: Management of academic data, diplomas, and graduation certificates.
services.contentEn:
The Academic Administration Service handles important graduation documents:

  1. Graduation registration and filing
  2. Issuance of diplomas and final transcripts
  3. Competency certificates and SKPI (Certificate of Professional Competency)
  4. Verification of alumni data

questions.textEn: Ease of access to academic information
Satisfaction with the online KRS system
